alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Menifee; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Morgan, southeastern Menifee, northwestern Magoffin and northeastern Wolfe Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pekin, or 7 miles west of West Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Henry, New Cummer, Woodsbend, Mize, Twentysix, Rexville, Dehart and Yocum around 455 PM EDT. Grassy Creek, Nickell, Licking River, Demund, Sellars and Daysboro around 500 PM EDT. West Liberty, Greear, Index, Liberty Road, Panama, Lizzielane, Payton, Pomp and Lick Branch around 505 PM EDT. Lewis, Malone, Gordon Ford, Well Station, Stacy Fork, Caney, Cannel City and Lenox around 510 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include White Oak, Williams, Cottle, Florress, Matthew, Holliday, Cisco, Bloomington, Wonnie and Harper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
